field.name: summary
field.value: Opening channel on a client should perhaps be done asynchronousely

field.name: description
field.value:
When a client proxy is pulled from the container it is automatically {{Open()}}ed synchronously which may take a few seconds and freeze the UI on the client app.
Alternatives should be checked, if doing {{BeginOpen()}} / {{EndOpen()}} is a better option (does it still have the same effect as calling it synchronousely? See the comment in the code), or perhaps disabling this eager opening on demand...
